title: Taj Mahal
short_description: Explore the exquisite beauty of the Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the most iconic landmarks in India.

title: Kerala
short_description: Cruise through the serene and picturesque Kerala backwaters, surrounded by lush green landscapes and tranquil waters.

title: Jaipur
short_description: Experience the rich cultural heritage of Jaipur, the Pink City, by visiting magnificent palaces, forts, and colorful bazaars.

title: Manali
short_description: Embark on an adventure in the scenic Himalayan town of Manali, known for its breathtaking landscapes and outdoor activities.

title: Sundarbans
short_description: Explore the unique Sundarbans mangrove forest, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger and diverse wildlife species.

title: Varanasi
short_description: Visit the ancient and sacred city of Varanasi, where you can witness spiritual rituals and explore historical temples.
